title: Why now is a great time to buy an iPad [Hint: Save $200]
description: Don’t miss out on the versatility of Apple's iPad. Whether watching videos or creating amazing art, find the perfect tablet at a sale price. (via Cult of Mac - Apple news, rumors, reviews and how-tos)
author: Ed Hardy
excerpt: Don’t miss out on the versatility of Apple's iPad. Whether watching videos or creating amazing art, find the perfect tablet at a sale price.

html:
• Daily deals

It doesn’t matter that you didn’t get the iPad, iPad Pro or iPad Air you wanted for Christmas. You can buy one now and save up to $200.

Apple’s tablets are great whether you only want something to watch video on or are looking for light-duty notebook. And a wide variety of models are now on sale at up to 17% off!

This post contains affiliate links. Cult of Mac may earn a commission when you use our links to buy items.

iPad: You know you want one

Looking for a computer to lean back on the couch and watch videos? iPad. Need a computer to take handwritten notes on? iPad. Want to create amazing digital art? iPad. Need a very portable computer for business communication? iPad.

Apple’s tablet is useful in so many ways. It’s a combination of powerful and portable that’s hard to beat.

And there’s a range of sizes and price levels to choose from. Serious users can get the super-thin iPad Pro with either a 13- or 11-inch beautiful OLED display. It runs the new M4 processor , and is ready to handle the new Apple Intelligence AI-powered features, too. I reviewed it (and love it).

Or save a bit and get an M2-powered iPad Air, which comes in 13- and 11-inch options. It uses an Apple M2 processor so it’s not quite as speedy, though. Still, it supports Apple Intelligence, too.

Those looking for a real bargain can pick up the basic iPad 10. Don’t underestimate it — this is a capable computer up to most anything a child (and many adults) needs to do.

But whatever iPad version is right for you, odds are it’s on sale.

Don’t miss iPad Pro and iPad Air discounts

The base model 13-inch M4 iPad Pro offers 256GB of storage and ordinarily sells for $1,299. But you can ignore that because Amazon’s cost is $1,099 after an 15% discount. That’s $200 in savings.

And the 11-inch M4 model is 10% off. Instead of $999, it’s $899 — a nice discount.

  • Buy 13-inch iPad Pro from: Amazon
  • Buy 11-inch iPad Pro from: Amazon

Apple’s best selling tablet

Apple iPad Pro M4 11-Inch

5.0

iPad Pro is Apple’s most powerful, with the best-looking display. It’s a no-compromises tablet for those ready to get things done.

Pros:

  • Gorgeous screen
  • As powerful as a MacBook

Move down to the middle tier of Apple tablets, and Amazon cuts the price of the 13-inch M2 iPad Air with 128GB of storage from $799 to $699 — a lucky 13% discount.

The 11-inch version is ordinarily $599, but it’s down to $499 after a 17% discount.

  • Buy 13-inch iPad Air from: Amazon
  • Buy 11-inch iPad Air from: Amazon or Best Buy

Biggest iPad Air ever!

Apple iPad Air M2 13-inch

4.5

The 2024 iPad Air runs a quick Apple M2 processor. And Apple added the first Air with 13-inch screen to the 11-inch variant. The newest model includes faster Wi-Fi and a landscape front camera.

The M2 iPad Air also supports the new Apple Pencil Pro with all its useful gestures.

Pros:

  • Makes a 13-inch Apple tablet affordable
  • Ideal for those needing a large screen but not cutting-edge performance
  • Supports Apple Pencil Pro

Cons:

  • A bit underpowered for the price.

iPad 10 with its 10.9-inch display is always Apple’s bargain tablet, and Amazon lowered the cost even more. Rather than $349 it’s down to $319 — save 9%.

  • Buy iPad 10 from: Amazon

Best budget iPad for years

Apple iPad (10th Generation)

4.5

The iPad 10th-generation is Apple's best entry-level iPad for years. Completely redesigned, it has a modern, all-screen design, faster processor and better cameras. Everything you want in an iPad at an affordable price.

Pros:

  • Cool modern design
  • Big 10.9-inch Liquid Retina display
  • 12MP front and back cameras
  • Wi-Fi 6 for fast streaming

Cons:

  • Limited 64GB storage
  • No Apple Intelligence

Take note that these aren’t permanent price cuts. They could last all week or they could end as soon as Amazon runs out of stock.
